metadata.exif:ImageDescription: Photo shows Fatima Sultana of Afghanistan, with group, including her sons and an imposter Stanley Clifford Weyman in military uniform at left, leaving the White House after meeting with President Harding (Source: Fatima Sultana's great-grandson Zaid Hamid, January 2014)
